Package com.google.wave.api.event

Interface Summary
Event Object describing a single event, that captures changes made to a wavelet or blip in a wave.
EventHandler An interface for robot event handler.
 

Class Summary
AbstractEvent The base class for all events.
AnnotatedTextChangedEvent Event triggered when text with an annotation has changed.
BlipContributorsChangedEvent Event triggered when contributors are added and/or removed from a blip.
BlipSubmittedEvent Event triggered when a blip is submitted.
DocumentChangedEvent Event triggered when a blip content is changed.
EventSerializer Object that is responsible for serializing and deserializing implementors of Event to and from JsonObject.
FormButtonClickedEvent Event triggered when a form button is clicked.
GadgetStateChangedEvent Event triggered when the state of a gadget has changed.
OperationErrorEvent Event triggered when an error on the server occurred when processing operations.
WaveletBlipCreatedEvent Event triggered when a new blip is created.
WaveletBlipRemovedEvent Event triggered when a blip is removed.
WaveletCreatedEvent Event triggered when a new wavelet is created.
WaveletFetchedEvent Event triggered when a wavelet is fetched.
WaveletParticipantsChangedEvent Event triggered when participants are added and/or removed from a wavelet.
WaveletSelfAddedEvent Event triggered when a robot is added to a wavelet.
WaveletSelfRemovedEvent Event triggered when a robot is removed from a wavelet.
WaveletTitleChangedEvent Event triggered when the title of the wavelet has changed.
 

Enum Summary
EventType The types of events.
 

Exception Summary
EventSerializationException Checked exception for signaling problem serializing or deserializing event JSON.
 

Annotation Types Summary
EventHandler.Capability An annotation that would define the robot's interest in handling a particular event.
